Info.Title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
Info.Writer: Quentin Tarantino, Quentin Tarantino (character The Bride), Uma Thurman (character The Bride)
Info.Actors: Vivica A. Fox, Ambrosia Kelley, Michael Parks, James Parks
Info.Plot: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.
Info.Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 22 wins & 82 nominations.
